title: Is There A Team at Riot Focused On Lore For Current Champions That No Longer Fit In?
body: I know Riot usually has teams work on specific projects at a time. Is there a team working on lore for champions currently in the game who don't fit in with the changes in lore? Like {{champion:56}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:64}} to name a few. If not currently being worked on, has this been talked about with the potential of being worked on the next season?

replies.body: A team has been put together to work on all of the bios for current Champs. They are working to add a more in-depth introduction along the lines of those for Miss Fortune, TF, Graves and Gangplank. You will see more examples in the month ahead.
I will wait with a critical eye; expect no mercy. The oldest and most beloved champions in League deserve no less.
